Name: Waiting of the Far Sea
Description: An epic weapon for Heavy Guardian. Forged by upgrading <color=#ef8e60>Rock Spinebreaker</color>, this weapon can be further enhanced in future seasons using a small amount of Glinting Stellar Core.
Description2:
"The tide is not only gentle; it can become a stern barrier.
Great waves lie prostrate before the reefs, safeguarding the silence behind.
The blade's edge is like the spine of the earth, firm and unyielding.
Each impact echoes the ceaseless song of the ocean.
Guardian, the faith of the deep sea has long been bound to your soul."
(Excerpt from "Book of the Depths III")
